explanations.app/: Core application code (models, controllers, middleware, providers)
explanations.app/Models/: Eloquent model classes representing database tables
explanations.app/Providers/: Service providers for bootstrapping application services
explanations.database/factories/: Model factories for generating test data

explanations.routes/api.php: API routes (stateless, token-based auth, no CSRF). Install with: php artisan install:api

controllers.tree:
app/Http/Controllers/
├── Api/
│   ├── UserController.php
│   └── PostController.php
├── Controller.php
└── Web/
    └── HomeController.php

explanations.app/Http/Resources/: API resource classes for JSON transformation

explanations.app/Jobs/: Queueable job classes for async processing
